name: Aya Cash
description:
Let's look in our mailbox, shall we? Here's a letter from a reader in Nevada, who...

Oh crap. OH CRAP!

WARNING: the following contains a spoiler for Season 2 of "The Boys"

... who asks as to profile Aya Cash, who "plays a Nazi supervillain on The Boys". Crap!

We just started to get into "The Boys" and barely got to Cash's character, who is... what? A Nazi supervillain? But she appears to be so cool, other than that name of hers... Stormfront. Oh, right, Stormfront. Like that antisemitic website. Seems pretty obvious now.

In any case, Aya Cash is Jewish on her father's side, self-indentifies as a Jew, and yes, plays Stormfront, a Nazi supervillain on "The Boys".

Thanks, reader from Nevada...
